From: Mizrahi, Tim [mailto:Tim.Mizrahi@wizards.com]

Joseph Horzepa

Copyright Agent

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX  75207

 

Re:  DMCA NOTICE OF ALLEGED COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

 

Dear Copyright Agent:

 

            This letter serves as notification, under the Digital Millennium
